NT3D_abstract_vp_o Class Reference

NT3D_abstract_vp_o class The abstract viewport class houses the driver independent part of the visualisation routines. More...

#include <nt3d_abstract_vp_obj.h>

Detailed Description

It is connected/registered with a viewport driver class NT3D_driver_vp_o childs. It uses the infrastructure provided by a driver class via the NT3D_vp_o interface.

Bug:
unknown
Warning:
do not override MakeCurrent() and SwapBuffer()
